Blockchain Currency Converter

Quickly calculate your Bitcoin trade profits. Enter buy and sell prices, and instantly see your gains or losses—perfect for traders and crypto enthusiasts.

Download on the App Store See features Privacy policy

Blockchain Currency Converter is your simple tool for tracking Bitcoin trade profits. Just enter your buy and sell prices, and the app will calculate your profit or loss instantly. Designed for both beginners and experienced traders, it helps you make informed decisions and track your trading performance with ease.

Why you’ll love it

Instant profit calculation

Enter your buy and sell prices to see your profit or loss in real time.

Supports multiple currencies

Convert between Bitcoin and major fiat currencies for accurate results.

Simple & intuitive

Clean interface makes it easy to enter values and view results—no clutter, just what you need.

No account required

Use the app instantly—no sign-up or personal data needed.

Track multiple trades

Easily calculate profits for different trades and keep a record of your results.

Privacy-first

Your data stays on your device. No tracking or unnecessary permissions.

How it works

  1. Enter buy price: Input the price at which you bought Bitcoin.
  2. Enter sell price: Input the price at which you sold (or plan to sell) Bitcoin.
  3. See results: Instantly view your profit or loss, including conversion to your chosen currency.
  4. Repeat: Calculate for as many trades as you like—no limits.

Screenshots

Get Blockchain Currency Converter

FAQ

Does Blockchain Currency Converter require an internet connection?

An internet connection is needed to fetch the latest exchange rates. Calculations can be done offline with manual input.

Is my trading data stored or shared?

No. All calculations are done locally on your device and are not shared.

Which currencies are supported?

The app supports Bitcoin and major fiat currencies like USD, EUR, GBP, and more.

Is the app free?

The app is free to download and use for all

Can I track multiple trades?

Yes, you can calculate and keep a record of multiple trades within the app.

Support

Questions or feedback? Email cloud.point88@gmail.com.
